channel.title: ::pnpc command, on another player..?
channel.description:
Is there a known command already written? Or can someone show me how to implement a command like ::pnpc, but have it so I can set it on other players?
I would like to be able to do this for certain events.
(Ex. Black Knights VS White Knights)
Thank you in Advance! (I have TV)
